title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sailboat on Choppy Sea near Large Cliffs", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Choppy ocean across the foreground. At right, in middleground, a sailboat. Large, dark cliffs at left, beginning in middleground and extending back to horizon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Sailboat on Choppy Sea near Large Cliffs", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-33.
